entry.name: jQuery.ready.promise
entry.title: jQuery.ready.promise()
entry.desc: Return a Promise that is resolved when the document is ready.

argument.name: target
argument.desc: Object onto which the promise methods have to be attached

longdesc.p: See also ready(), which makes use of this.

example.desc: Listen for document ready using a Promise object.
Listen for document ready via jQuery.when.
